content: Hello,This is an introductory inject. You have 10 minutes to read this and familiarize yourselves with the platform. Injects like this represent events in the simulated world of this exercise. You can interact with the world using the tool CLI in the right part of your screen. To use a tool, select one from the panel on the very right. This will print the tools prefix into the console. Every prefix must be followed by an argument, depending on the tool youre using. Hover over the tool to see its usage.The example usage of browser, for instance, would be VISIT some.page.com. There is an exception to this in the email tool which takes two arguments, the recipients address, and the email content (EMAIL TO aaa@bbb.com Hello, this is the content of the email.).Rules:    - Make sure that you always have your team number selected in the top left corner. Switching to other teams is prohibited and will be monitored.    - Only have this page open on one of the computers in your group.    - Cooperate only with your teammates.    - Do not try to intentionally "break" the exercise, you may damage the experience for the entire group.    - Be patient and do not spam commands into the CLI, the content you see only refreshes every 5 seconds.Guidelines    - Use Firefox browser for optimal experience    - Discuss every action you take with your teammates.    - You do not have to successfully complete the exercise, in order to get a credit. You do, however, have to show dedication and actively participate in the exercise. Cheating or tampering with the exercise will only damage yours and others experience.    - There is not a strict end goal in this exercise. Even after you believe you have finished it, think about what else could be done and keep exploring.    - If you are struggling with a tool, read its tooltip by hovering over it. If there are further issues, contact the instructors.    - You can only send an email to one address at the time, make sure to read the EMAIL tooltip for correct usage.    - The tool panel in the right section of your screen is scrollable (you may not see all the tools at once if you have smaller resolution).    - The real length of the exercise is 5 minutes shorter than the timer shows (a reminder inject will be sent). Use those last 5 minutes to ***save the html*** of this page, you will need it in later exercises. This page will no longer be accessible once the exercise concludes.In case you think you are having trouble with the technical part of the exercise, ask the instructors in person, or write a simulated email to instructors@help.com.Once you read this, test your understanding of the CLI and tools by sending a test email with some content to the instructors@help.com address. Instructors
Email to instructors was sent, wait for reply.
EMAIL TO instructors@help.com How can we help you today?
Email to instructors was sent, wait for reply.
Greetings,please see attached one of phishing mails with forged sender and a link to your website. Please have a look at that.Thanks,FREEMAIL provider

Dear CSIRT-U,Im forwarding yet another phishing mail.Best regards,--Dr. DoeFaculty of ScienceOn 30.8.2021 23:17, Admin <mailto:it_department@mail.ex> wrote:https://nice-project.uni.ex/settings/?email=doe@mail.uni.exhttps://nice-project.uni.ex/settings/?email=doe@mail.uni.exhttps://nice-project.uni.ex/settings/?email=doe@mail.uni.exYour Account will soon be suspendedYour allowed Email Quota usage has been exceeded on your account.doe@mail.uni.exPlease kindly verify you are Human and not a robot by following the below link, so we can get your account running normal and retreive all pending mails.https://nice-project.uni.ex/settings/?email=doe@mail.uni.ex<="" account="">Note: You must verify your account using webmail to enable you access your account after 12:00AM before you can send mail.If no action is taken, you may cease to receive incoming emailsThis Email was sent to "doe@mail.uni.ex" as a User from "mail.uni.ex"Sincerelymail.uni.ex support team.

To: csirt@uni.ex, harris@mail.uni.exSubject: Suspicious content of our project homepageGreetings,could you please investigate what happened at our website? I can see only a folder with some files (see attachment) instead of our web presentation: https://nice-project.uni.ex/Thanks a lot!Jane Taylorproject managerNice project
Just a reminter, the email address for the general data protection officer is dpo@mail.uni.ex
1 mail sent to kathy@mail.uni.ex from it_department@mail.ex,1 mail sent to lisa.grant@mail.uni.ex from it_department@mail.ex,1 mail sent to peter.quinn@mail.uni.ex from it_department@mail.ex

EMAIL TO dpo@mail.uni.ex Dear Ms. Hoffmann, just to inform you, we are currently investigating a potential security breach regarding university accounts. Potentially compromised are 3 accounts in the last 24 hours. We will let you know about progress on this case. Have a nice day, Team 8.
Email was sent, wait for reply.
Dear CSIRT-U,thanks for reporting this incident. Keep me posted if you discover anything related to personal information leak.Sincerely,Kim HoffmanData Protection Officer

EMAIL TO cloud@uni.ex Dear cloud team, we are currently investigating a compromised website under your control, regarding nice-project.uni.ex. Folder settings is being used for phishing attack. Please take a look at what happened. The domain is currently blocked under our jurisdiction. Let us know when you solve the issue. Yours, CSIRT Team 8
Email was sent, wait for reply.

EMAIL TO doe@mail.uni.ex Dear Doe, thank you for your report. Would you be able to send us the headers of your email? It would help investigate this case more quickly. If you are unsure how to get the headers, please see at this link https://mxtoolbox.com/public/content/emailheaders/. Please let us know. Thanks, your CSIRT Team 8
Email was sent, wait for reply.
Sorry, I dont know what to do, we just provide the infrastructure for our users. Please contact admin of the VM hosting this web, harris@mail.uni.ex.Best,Cloud provider

EMAIL TO harris@mail.uni.ex Dear Mr. Harris, we are currently investigating a compromised website under your control, regarding nice-project.uni.ex. Folder settings is being used for phishing attack. Please take a look at what happened. The domain is currently blocked under our jurisdiction. Let us know when you solve the issue. Yours, CSIRT Team 8
Email was sent, wait for reply.
Dear CSIRT-U,Im glad we have such great security team! I send the headers in attachement.(the headers are the same as in freemail_phishing_headers.txt from the initial inject)Dr. Doe
Hello, Unfortunately, I cannot log to the nice-project.uni.ex as you have blocked it. I dont know what I can do without access to it.Regards,Harris
1 mail sent to kathy@mail.uni.ex from it_department@mail.ex,1 mail sent to lisa.grant@mail.uni.ex from it_department@mail.ex,1 mail sent to peter.quinn@mail.uni.ex from it_department@mail.ex

EMAIL TO kathy@mail.uni.ex Dear university member, we inform you on behalf of the CSIRT team regarding a phishing attack, which tried to target you. An email was sent to you by it_department@mail.ex, you should delete it and never provide your credentials to the websites attached. If this by any chance happened, let us know. Yours CSIRT Team 8
Email was sent, wait for reply.

An email was sent to you by it_department@mail.ex, you should delete it and never provide your credentials to the websites attached. If this by any chance happened, let us know. Yours CSIRT Team 8
Email was sent, wait for reply.

EMAIL TO peter.quinn@mail.uni.ex Dear university member, we inform you on behalf of the CSIRT team regarding a phishing attack, which tried to target you. An email was sent to you by it_department@mail.ex, you should delete it and never provide your credentials to the websites attached. If this by any chance happened, let us know. Yours CSIRT Team 8
Email was sent, wait for reply.
Greetings,Yes, I have visited https://nice-project.uni.ex/.Should I reinstall my computer???Best regards,Kathy Lee
Greetings,I just changed my password.Best regards,Lisa Grant

EMAIL TO kathy@mail.uni.ex Dear Kathy, hopefully you did not provide any personal information at the website. In any case you should change your password, that way you will ensure your security. You do not have to reinstall your computer. Your CSIRT Team 8
Email was sent, wait for reply.
Dear CSIRT-U,I think i logged into the page, so I just changed my passwords. Am I safe now?Thank you very much for your services,Kathy
Invalid request, the tool does not exist

SHARE Dear other CSIRTS: just to inform you, a phishing attack was happening abusing our address https://nice-project.uni.ex, we blocked the IP address until the problem is fixed.  Sending email address was (as far as we know) it_department@mail.ex (under freemail.ex).
The exercise will conclude in one minute.Instructors

The exercise is over. Do not send further commands.Use the last 5 minutes to download the html of this website (you will need it for further analysis in the next exercise). Ensure you can open it and that it contains all your interactions with the system.Instructors
